name: Wintry Mushroom Soup
preparation:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together seasoning with milk; set aside.
  2. In Wok, heat butter over medium-high heat. Add mushrooms; sauté until lightly browned, about 5 min.
  3. Add reserved seasoning mixture; bring to a boil, stirring often. Simmer until thickened, 1–2 min.
tips: Save prep time and buy a package of pre-sliced mushrooms. Or mix and match—choose your favourite kinds for a medley of flavour. You’ll need a generous 1⁄2 lb (225 g) whole mushrooms.
